files.patch:
@@ -556,0 +556,29 @@
+################################################################################
+# Setup generation of Classfile Processing API javadoc
+
+CLASSFILE_SRC := $(TOPDIR)/src/java.base/share/classes
+CLASSFILE_TARGET := $(DOCS_OUTPUTDIR)/classfile-api/javadoc
+SOURCEPATH := $(call PathList, $(call FindModuleSrcDirs, java.base))
+
+$(eval $(call SetupExecute, CLASSFILE_API_TARGET, \
+    DEPS := $(BUILD_TOOLS_JDK), \
+    OUTPUT_DIR := $(CLASSFILE_TARGET), \
+    SUPPORT_DIR := $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/docs, \
+    COMMAND := $(BUILD_JAVA) -Djava.awt.headless=true \
+      -Dextlink.spec.version=19 \
+      -Djspec.version=19 \
+      $(NEW_JAVADOC) -d $(CLASSFILE_TARGET) -use \
+      -taglet build.tools.taglet.JSpec\$$JLS \
+      -taglet build.tools.taglet.JSpec\$$JVMS \
+      -tagletpath $(BUILDTOOLS_OUTPUTDIR)/jdk_tools_classes \
+      -notimestamp -public \
+      --add-exports java.base/jdk.internal.access=ALL-UNNAMED \
+      -encoding ISO-8859-1 -docencoding UTF-8 -Xdoclint:none \
+      -locale en_US --source-path $(SOURCEPATH) \
+      jdk.internal.classfile \
+      jdk.internal.classfile.attribute \
+      jdk.internal.classfile.components \
+      jdk.internal.classfile.constantpool \
+      jdk.internal.classfile.instruction \
+))
+
@@ -809,0 +838,2 @@
+docs-classfile-api-javadoc: $(CLASSFILE_API_TARGET)
+
@@ -820,1 +851,1 @@
-    docs-specs-zip
+    docs-specs-zip docs-classfile-api-javadoc
@@ -825,1 +856,1 @@
-    docs-jdk-index docs-zip docs-specs-zip
+    docs-jdk-index docs-zip docs-specs-zip docs-classfile-api-javadoc

@@ -558,0 +558,6 @@
+$(eval $(call SetupTarget, docs-classfile-api-javadoc, \
+    MAKEFILE := Docs, \
+    TARGET := docs-classfile-api-javadoc, \
+    DEPS := buildtools-modules runnable-buildjdk, \
+))
+
